text: "Black Coffee in Bed" is a 1982 song by British band Squeeze. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album Sweets from a Stranger. It went to number 51 in the United Kingdom and number 26 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Chart. ==Track listing== # "Black Coffee in Bed" (6:12) # "The Hunt" (3:52) == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Blue- eyed soul songs Category:Squeeze (band) songs
title: Black Coffee in Bed
